title: Donut Country – Shopify Web Design & Branding
description: A fun and imaginative Shopify web design project centered around a donut-themed brand. Crafted a playful identity and strategic branding elements to establish a memorable visual presence for Donut Country.

title: Say Hay – Shopify Web Development & Minimal Branding
description: Executed a modern Shopify web development project for a healthy juice brand. Designed a sleek, minimalistic brand identity that aligns with the company’s clean and fresh image.

title: Sharky – Shopify Website & Branding for Startups
description: Delivered a full-scale Shopify web development solution for a shark-themed startup brand. Included branding, UI/UX design, and engaging visuals to create a bold, energetic online presence.

title: Deluxe Canva – Shopify Development & Bold Visual Identity
description: Developed a bold and premium Shopify store for a high-end Pic art brand. Focused on strong visual storytelling, dynamic UI elements, and a sharp design approach to reflect product quality.

title: Frag Perfumes – Shopify Store Development & Nature-Inspired Branding
description: Built a nature-inspired Shopify web store for a perfume company. Combined soft color palettes with elegant branding to convey freshness, luxury, and emotional connection through scent.
